pages.text: In this $(item)Simulation$() there are tall $(item)Towers$() that can be seen from miles away, these abandoned outposts are the entry points to vast $(item)Dungeons$().$(br2)Before entering such a $(item)Dungeon$() you should be well prepared because it's crawling with monsters, but fighting your way to the bottom might be worth the struggle.

Each new floor adds additional $(item)Rewards$() and the lower floors pose quite the challenge for unprepared adventurers.$(br2)Additionally, each new floor in the $(item)Dungeon$() has more rooms than the previous floor.$(br2)The last floor of the $(item)Dungeons$() contain an abudance of $(l:sim_2/resources/1_minerals_and_ores#sooty)Sooty Marble$().
